segments.text: I think this is such a classic family kitchen moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her apron, focused on the dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the scene nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the faucet's running and the sink's full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring over, forming a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed yet, still polishing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy's climbing the stool to the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar, looking so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles under him, that's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, hand out for one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make too much noise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is serene, a nice contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how kids find mischief anywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But seriously, someone turn off that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't want to clean up that mess later.
segments.speaker: PAR
